column4: Assistive technology services is the type of service that adapts the curriculum, materials, or instruction for students identified as needing special education because of a delay or disability.

column2: Sign language and cued language services

A type of service other than what is currently defined in CEDS that adapts the curriculum, materials, or instruction for students identified as needing special education because of a delay or disability.
